main event: A resident of Yuma, Arizona observed a bright elliptical object in the sky on the evening of April 8, 1959.
interesting points: Mr. Hamilton observed the object for approximately 5 minutes before it disappeared from view., The object was described as bright and elliptical in shape., The object moved rapidly in a northeasterly direction., The speed of the object was noted to be much faster than any conventional aircraft., The Yuma Air Force Base was notified and an investigation was initiated, but the object could not be conclusively identified.
witness description: Mr. E.R. Hamilton, a resident of Yuma, Arizona
